trans-unit.resname: J22·1 | Agrus Kos, Eternal Soldier | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Agrus Kos, Eternal Soldier
trans-unit.target: 不朽士兵阿固寇斯

trans-unit.resname: J22·1 | Agrus Kos, Eternal Soldier | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Vigilance
trans-unit.target: 警戒

trans-unit.resname: J22·1 | Agrus Kos, Eternal Soldier | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Whenever CARDNAME becomes the target of an ability that targets only it, you may pay {1}{R/W}. If you do, copy that ability for each other creature you control that ability could target. Each copy targets a different one of those creatures. ({R/W} can be paid with either {R} or {W}.)
trans-unit.target: 每当CARDNAME成为异能的目标，且该异能仅以它为目标时，你可以支付{1}{R/W}。若你如此作，则该异能每能以一个由你操控的其他生物为目标，便将该异能复制一次。每个复制品都要以这些生物之一为目标，且不能重复选择。（{R/W}可用{R}或{W}来支付。）

trans-unit.resname: J22·2 | Angelic Cub | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Angelic Cub
trans-unit.target: 幼狮天使

trans-unit.resname: J22·2 | Angelic Cub | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Whenever CARDNAME becomes the target of a spell or ability for the first time each turn, put a +1/+1 counter on it.
trans-unit.target: 每当CARDNAME每回合首度成为咒语或异能的目标时，在其上放置一个+1/+1指示物。

trans-unit.resname: J22·2 | Angelic Cub | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: As long as CARDNAME has three or more +1/+1 counters on it, it has flying.
trans-unit.target: 只要CARDNAME上有三个或更多+1/+1指示物，它便具有飞行异能。

trans-unit.resname: J22·3 | Chains of Custody | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Chains of Custody
trans-unit.target: 监护锁链

trans-unit.resname: J22·3 | Chains of Custody | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Enchant creature you control
trans-unit.target: 结附于由你操控的生物

trans-unit.resname: J22·3 | Chains of Custody | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: When CARDNAME enters the battlefield, exile target nonland permanent an opponent controls until CARDNAME leaves the battlefield.
trans-unit.target: 当CARDNAME进战场时，放逐目标由对手操控的非地永久物，直到CARDNAME离开战场为止。

trans-unit.resname: J22·3 | Chains of Custody | Card Text | Paragraph 3
trans-unit.source: Enchanted creature has ward {2}. (Whenever it becomes the target of a spell or ability an opponent controls, counter it unless that player pays {2}.)
trans-unit.target: 所结附的生物具有守护{2}。（每当它成为由对手操控之咒语或异能的目标时，除非该牌手支付{2}，否则反击之。）

trans-unit.resname: J22·4 | Distinguished Conjurer | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Distinguished Conjurer
trans-unit.target: 杰出咒法师

trans-unit.resname: J22·4 | Distinguished Conjurer | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Whenever another creature enters the battlefield under your control, you gain 1 life.
trans-unit.target: 每当另一个生物在你的操控下进战场时，你获得1点生命。

trans-unit.resname: J22·4 | Distinguished Conjurer | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: {4}{W}, {T}: Exile another target creature you control, then return it to the battlefield under its owner's control.
trans-unit.target: {4}{W}，{T}：放逐另一个目标由你操控的生物，然后将它在其拥有者的操控下移回战场。

trans-unit.resname: J22·5 | Ingenious Leonin | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Ingenious Leonin
trans-unit.target: 狮族巧匠

trans-unit.resname: J22·5 | Ingenious Leonin | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: {3}{W}: Put a +1/+1 counter on another target attacking creature you control. If that creature is a Cat, it gains first strike until end of turn.
trans-unit.target: {3}{W}：在另一个目标由你操控且进行攻击的生物上放置一个+1/+1指示物。如果该生物是猫，则它获得先攻异能直到回合结束。

trans-unit.resname: J22·6 | Lita, Mechanical Engineer | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Lita, Mechanical Engineer
trans-unit.target: 机械工程师莉塔

trans-unit.resname: J22·6 | Lita, Mechanical Engineer | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Vigilance
trans-unit.target: 警戒

trans-unit.resname: J22·6 | Lita, Mechanical Engineer | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: At the beginning of your end step, untap each other artifact creature you control.
trans-unit.target: 在你的结束步骤开始时，重置所有由你操控的其他神器生物。

trans-unit.resname: J22·6 | Lita, Mechanical Engineer | Card Text | Paragraph 3
trans-unit.source: {3}{W}, {T}: Create a 5/5 colorless Vehicle artifact token named Zeppelin with flying and crew 3. (It has "Tap any number of creatures you control with total power 3 or more: This Vehicle becomes an artifact creature until end of turn.")
trans-unit.target: {3}{W}，{T}：派出一个5/5无色，名称为飞艇的载具衍生神器，且具有飞行与搭载3。（它具有「横置任意数量由你操控且力量总和等于或大于3的生物：此载具成为神器生物直到回合结束。」）

trans-unit.resname: J22·7 | Magnanimous Magistrate | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Magnanimous Magistrate
trans-unit.target: 宽宏执政官

trans-unit.resname: J22·7 | Magnanimous Magistrate | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: CARDNAME enters the battlefield with five reprieve counters on it.
trans-unit.target: CARDNAME进战场时上面有五个免难指示物。

trans-unit.resname: J22·7 | Magnanimous Magistrate | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Whenever another nontoken creature you control dies, if its mana value was 1 or greater, you may remove that many reprieve counters from CARDNAME. If you do, return that card to the battlefield under its owner's control.
trans-unit.target: 每当另一个由你操控且非衍生物的生物死去时，若它的法术力值等于或大于1，则你可以从CARDNAME上移去等量的免难指示物。若你如此作，则将该牌在其拥有者的操控下移回战场。

trans-unit.resname: J22·8 | Preston, the Vanisher | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Preston, the Vanisher
trans-unit.target: 妙手空空摩技

trans-unit.resname: J22·8 | Preston, the Vanisher | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Whenever another nontoken creature enters the battlefield under your control, if it wasn't cast, create a token that's a copy of that creature, except it's a 0/1 white Illusion.
trans-unit.target: 每当另一个非衍生物的生物在你操控下进战场时，若它未经施放，则派出一个为该生物复制品的衍生物，但它是0/1白色虚影。

trans-unit.resname: J22·8 | Preston, the Vanisher | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: {1}{W}, Sacrifice five Illusions: Exile target nonland permanent.
trans-unit.target: {1}{W}，牺牲五个虚影：放逐目标非地永久物。

trans-unit.resname: J22·9 | Alandra, Sky Dreamer | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Alandra, Sky Dreamer
trans-unit.target: 空梦师雅岚卓

trans-unit.resname: J22·9 | Alandra, Sky Dreamer | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Whenever you draw your second card each turn, create a 2/2 blue Drake creature token with flying.
trans-unit.target: 每当你抓每回合中你的第二张牌时，派出一个2/2蓝色，具飞行异能的龙兽衍生生物。

trans-unit.resname: J22·9 | Alandra, Sky Dreamer | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Whenever you draw your fifth card each turn, CARDNAME and Drakes you control each get +X/+X until end of turn, where X is the number of cards in your hand.
trans-unit.target: 每当你抓每回合中你的第五张牌时，CARDNAME和由你操控的龙兽各得+X/+X直到回合结束，X为你的手牌数量。

trans-unit.resname: J22·10 | Biblioplex Kraken | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Biblioplex Kraken
trans-unit.target: 茂典阁巨海兽

trans-unit.resname: J22·10 | Biblioplex Kraken | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: When CARDNAME enters the battlefield, scry 3. (Look at the top three cards of your library, then put any number of them on the bottom of your library and the rest on top in any order.)
trans-unit.target: 当CARDNAME进战场时，占卜3。（检视你牌库顶的三张牌，然后将其中任意数量的牌以任意顺序置于你牌库底，其余则以任意顺序置于你牌库顶。）

trans-unit.resname: J22·10 | Biblioplex Kraken | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Whenever CARDNAME attacks, you may return another creature you control to its owner's hand. If you do, CARDNAME can't be blocked this turn.
trans-unit.target: 每当CARDNAME攻击时，你可以将另一个由你操控的生物移回其拥有者手上。若你如此作，则CARDNAME本回合不能被阻挡。

trans-unit.resname: J22·11 | Hold for Questioning | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Hold for Questioning
trans-unit.target: 扣押讯问

trans-unit.resname: J22·11 | Hold for Questioning | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Enchant creature or planeswalker
trans-unit.target: 结附于生物或鹏洛客

trans-unit.resname: J22·11 | Hold for Questioning | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: When CARDNAME enters the battlefield, tap enchanted permanent and investigate. (Create a Clue token. It's an artifact with "{2}, Sacrifice this artifact: Draw a card.")
trans-unit.target: 当CARDNAME进战场时，横置所结附的永久物并探查。（派出一个线索衍生物。它是具有「{2}，牺牲此神器：抓一张牌」的神器。）

trans-unit.resname: J22·11 | Hold for Questioning | Card Text | Paragraph 3
trans-unit.source: Enchanted permanent doesn't untap during its controller's untap step and its activated abilities can't be activated.
trans-unit.target: 所结附的永久物于其操控者的重置步骤中不能重置，且其起动式异能都不能起动。

trans-unit.resname: J22·12 | Isu the Abominable | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Isu the Abominable
trans-unit.target: 雪宝伊须

trans-unit.resname: J22·12 | Isu the Abominable | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: You may look at the top card of your library any time.
trans-unit.target: 你可以随时检视你的牌库顶牌。

trans-unit.resname: J22·12 | Isu the Abominable | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: You may play snow lands and cast snow spells from the top of your library.
trans-unit.target: 你可以从你的牌库顶使用雪境地和施放雪境咒语。

trans-unit.resname: J22·12 | Isu the Abominable | Card Text | Paragraph 3
trans-unit.source: Whenever another snow permanent enters the battlefield under your control, you may pay {G}, {W}, or {U}. If you do, put a +1/+1 counter on CARDNAME.
trans-unit.target: 每当另一个雪境永久物在你的操控下进战场时，你可以支付{G}，{W}或{U}。若你如此作，则在CARDNAME上放置一个+1/+1指示物。

trans-unit.resname: J22·13 | Kenessos, Priest of Thassa | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Kenessos, Priest of Thassa
trans-unit.target: 塔萨僧侣克涅索斯

trans-unit.resname: J22·13 | Kenessos, Priest of Thassa | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: If you would scry a number of cards, scry that many cards plus one instead.
trans-unit.target: 如果你将占卜若干牌，则改为占卜该数量加一的牌。

trans-unit.resname: J22·13 | Kenessos, Priest of Thassa | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: {3}{G/U}: Look at the top card of your library. If it's a Kraken, Leviathan, Octopus, or Serpent creature card, you may put it onto the battlefield. If you don't put the card onto the battlefield, you may put it on the bottom of your library.
trans-unit.target: {3}{G/U}：检视你的牌库顶牌。如果它是巨海兽，海怪，章鱼或巨蛇生物牌，则你可以将之放进战场。若你未将该牌放进战场，则你可以将它置于你的牌库底。

trans-unit.resname: J22·14 | Launch Mishap | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Counter target creature or planeswalker spell. Create a 1/1 colorless Thopter artifact creature token with flying.
trans-unit.target: 反击目标生物或鹏洛客咒语。派出一个1/1无色，具飞行异能的振翼机衍生神器生物。

trans-unit.resname: J22·15 | Merfolk Pupil | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Merfolk Pupil

trans-unit.source: When CARDNAME enters the battlefield, draw a card, then discard a card.

trans-unit.target: {1}{U}，从你的坟墓场放逐CARDNAME：抓一张牌，然后弃一张牌。

trans-unit.resname: J22·16 | Pirated Copy | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Pirated Copy
trans-unit.target: 剽窃复体

trans-unit.resname: J22·16 | Pirated Copy | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: You may have CARDNAME enter the battlefield as a copy of any creature on the battlefield, except it's a Pirate in addition to its other types and it has "Whenever this creature or another creature with the same name deals combat damage to a player, you draw a card."
trans-unit.target: 你可以使CARDNAME当成战场上任一生物的复制品来进入战场，但它额外具有海盗此类别，且具有「每当此生物或另一个与之同名的生物对任一牌手造成战斗伤害时，你抓一张牌。」

trans-unit.source: • Counter target spell unless its controller pays {4}.
trans-unit.target: •除非目标咒语的操控者支付{4}，否则反击之。

trans-unit.resname: J22·17 | Soul Read | Card Text | Paragraph 3
trans-unit.source: • Draw two cards.
trans-unit.target: •抓两张牌。

trans-unit.target: 同步驱赶

trans-unit.resname: J22·18 | Synchronized Eviction | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: This spell costs {2} less to cast if you control at least two creatures that share a creature type.
trans-unit.target: 如果你操控至少两个具共通生物类别的生物，则此咒语减少{2}来施放。

trans-unit.resname: J22·18 | Synchronized Eviction | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Put target nonland permanent into its owner's library second from the top.

trans-unit.source: Ashcoat of the Shadow Swarm
trans-unit.target: 影群灰衣

trans-unit.resname: J22·19 | Ashcoat of the Shadow Swarm | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Whenever CARDNAME attacks or blocks, other Rats you control get +X/+X until end of turn, where X is the number of Rats you control.
trans-unit.target: 每当CARDNAME攻击或阻挡时，由你操控的其他老鼠得+X/+X直到回合结束，X为由你操控的老鼠数量。

trans-unit.resname: J22·19 | Ashcoat of the Shadow Swarm | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: At the beginning of your end step, you may mill four cards. If you do, return up to two Rat creature cards from your graveyard to your hand. (To mill a card, put the top card of your library into your graveyard.)
trans-unit.target: 在你的结束步骤开始时，你可以磨四张牌。若你如此作，则将至多两张老鼠生物牌从你的坟墓场移回你手上。（磨一张牌的流程是将你牌库顶的牌置入你的坟墓场。）

trans-unit.resname: J22·20 | Conductor of Cacophony | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: {B}, Remove a +1/+1 counter from CARDNAME: It deals 1 damage to each other creature and each player.
trans-unit.target: {B}，从CARDNAME上移去一个+1/+1指示物：它对每个其他生物和每位牌手各造成1点伤害。

trans-unit.resname: J22·21 | Creeping Bloodsucker | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: At the beginning of your upkeep, CARDNAME deals 1 damage to each opponent. You gain life equal to the damage dealt this way.
trans-unit.target: 在你的维持开始时，CARDNAME向每位对手各造成1点伤害。你获得等同于以此法所造成的伤害之生命。

trans-unit.source: Choose one —

trans-unit.target: 当CARDNAME死去时，选择一项。如果你的总生命正好为13，则你可以两项都选。

trans-unit.source: • You draw a card and you lose 1 life.

trans-unit.source: • Exile target opponent's graveyard. That player loses 1 life.

trans-unit.resname: J22·24 | Ossuary Rats | Card Text | Paragraph 1

trans-unit.source: Whenever you gain life, CARDNAME gains indestructible until end of turn.
trans-unit.target: 每当你获得生命时，CARDNAME获得不灭异能直到回合结束。

trans-unit.resname: J22·25 | Rodolf Duskbringer | Card Text | Paragraph 3
trans-unit.source: At the beginning of your end step, you may pay {1}{W/B}. When you do, return target creature card with mana value X or less from your graveyard to the battlefield, where X is the amount of life you gained this turn.
trans-unit.target: 在你的结束步骤开始时，你可以支付{1}{W/B}。当你如此作时，将目标法术力值等于或小于X的生物牌从你的坟墓场移回战场，X为你本回合中获得过的生命数量。

trans-unit.source: Skullslither Worm
trans-unit.target: 滑骨蠕虫

trans-unit.resname: J22·26 | Skullslither Worm | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: When CARDNAME enters the battlefield, each opponent discards a card. For each opponent who can't, put two +1/+1 counters on CARDNAME.
trans-unit.target: 当CARDNAME进战场时，每位对手各弃一张牌。每有一位无法如此作的对手，便在CARDNAME上放置两个+1/+1指示物。

trans-unit.resname: J22·27 | Suspicious Shambler | Card Name

trans-unit.resname: J22·28 | Termination Facilitator | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Termination Facilitator
trans-unit.target: 终命业者

trans-unit.resname: J22·28 | Termination Facilitator | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: {T}: Put a bounty counter on target creature or planeswalker. Activate only as a sorcery.
trans-unit.target: {T}：在目标生物或鹏洛客上放置一个赏金指示物。只能于法术时机起动。

trans-unit.resname: J22·28 | Termination Facilitator | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Whenever a creature or planeswalker an opponent controls with a bounty counter on it is dealt damage, destroy it.

trans-unit.source: Whenever you cast a spell from anywhere other than your hand, you may pay {1}{U/R}. If you do, copy that spell and you may choose new targets for the copy. If the copy is a permanent spell, it gains haste and "At the beginning of your end step, sacrifice this permanent." (A copy of a permanent spell becomes a token.)
trans-unit.target: 每当你从你手牌以外的任何区域施放咒语时，你可以支付{1}{U/R}。若你如此作，则复制该咒语，且你可以为该复制品选择新的目标。如果该复制品是永久物咒语，则它获得敏捷与「在你的结束步骤开始时，牺牲此永久物。」（永久物咒语的复制品会成为衍生物。）

trans-unit.source: Whenever CARDNAME attacks, you may cast target instant or sorcery card from your graveyard by paying {R}{R} in addition to its other costs. If that spell would be put into a graveyard, exile it instead. When you cast that spell, CARDNAME gets +X/+0 until end of turn, where X is that spell's mana value.
trans-unit.target: 每当CARDNAME攻击时，你可以从你的坟墓场中施放目标瞬间或法术牌，但在其他费用以外，还须额外支付{R}{R}。若该咒语将进入坟墓场，则改为将它放逐。当你施放该咒语时，CARDNAME得+X/+0直到回合结束，X为该咒语的法术力值。
